actions.name: Screen Cleaner
actions.description:
Trigger: Another creature uses a [Shield] Action.

Effect: The triggering Action fails. If it was an Attack, it is @Affliction[disabled] 5. If it was an Ability, it is @Affliction[Nullified] 5.
